author: Buddha
message: All that we are is the result of what we have thought. The mind is everything. What we think we become.
title: Thought of the day

author: Henri-Frederic Amiel
message: Work while you have the light. You are responsible for the talent that has been entrusted to you.
title: Thought of the day

author: William Shakespeare
message: How far that little candle throws its beams! So shines a good deed in a naughty world.
title: Thought of the day

author: Napoleon Hill
message: Every adversity, every failure, every heartache carries with it the seed of an equal or greater benefit.
title: Thought of the day
